title: Family and Relationships 2
sentences: Mi hermano y su novia se
My brother and his girlfriend fell in love in high school.
conmigo este viernes por la noche?
Do you want to go out with me this Friday night?
They are twins and look very much alike.
es un hombre muy amable y trabajador.
My stepfather is a very kind and hard-working man.
Juan is single but is looking for a nice girlfriend.
My aunt has been a widow for ten years.
en una fiesta de cumpleaños el año pasado.
They met each other at a birthday party last year.
vuestra relación después de tanto tiempo?
Why are you going to break off your relationship after so much time?
tiene dos hijos de su primer matrimonio.
My stepmother has two children from her first marriage.
Sometimes we argue about unimportant things.
es el hijo de la mujer de mi padre.
My stepbrother is the son of my father's wife.
hace meses pero siguen siendo amigos.
They separated months ago but they are still friends.
muy feliz y nos gusta viajar.
We are a very happy couple and we like to travel.
y la boda es el próximo verano.
My cousin got engaged and the wedding is next summer.
Do you have a good relationship with your parents and siblings?
My best friend has a very noisy roommate.
que está hablando con tu hermana?
Who is that boy who is talking with your sister?
muy inteligente y siempre saca buenas notas.
She is a very intelligent girl and always gets good grades.
me ayuda siempre cuando necesito algo.
My neighbor always helps me when I need something.
Yesterday I met my older brother's fiancée.
treinta años y son muy felices.
My parents have been married for thirty years and they are very happy.
contigo otra vez por el mismo problema.
I don't want to argue with you again over the same problem.
What is your best friend like physically?
They are only acquaintances, they are not close friends.
con la familia es muy importante para mí.
Spending time with family is very important to me.
